sense.name: The part of the body between the neck and upper arm, or any of its subparts.
sense.examples: I hurt my shoulder playing basketball. She has very strong shoulders.

sense.name: A cut of meat including the upper joint of the foreleg.
sense.examples: I got some pork shoulder for dinner. The shoulder is a good cut of meat.

sense.name: The part of a garment that covers or fits over the shoulder.
sense.examples: A gold braid lay over the shoulder of his uniform. We no longer wear padded shoulders in our outfits.

sense.name: A narrow edge of land (usually unpaved) along the side of a road.
sense.examples: The car pulled off onto the shoulder. This road has very narrow shoulders.
